body:
Comment 5 by **philippe.laurent.leroux**: 
ah no ok, the slice doesnt accept at all jmin>jmax, that's the out of bound error

it's because i'm used to octave, it just returns an empty vector

oh i need more coffee today

sorry for having bothered
i corrected my bounds issues
and the other loop also works with range and the break condition (it was me messing up
with invariants in the loops of course)


in fact, i'm trying to use range as, as i understand it prevents boundary checking in
the loop and speeds up the code
but i think i can't do that in reverse order,  a reverse range operator doesnt exist
right ?

many thansk
